name: Authologic
headline: Stripe for online identity verification
description: Authologic is an orchestration and aggregation layer for local KYC & AML methods. We allow businesses to check the identity of their clients online using video/biometrics, banking data, and government issued digital IDs. Our API  allows a flexible definition of verification scenarios based on the risk profile of the client or risk involved in the given process.

founders.name: Jarek Sygitowicz, Founder
founders.description:
Previously co-founder of ZenCard, acquired by the largest bank in Central Eastern Europe.
Currently co-founder of Authologic responsible for client relations, design, and UX.

founders.name: Krzysztof Klimczak, Founder
founders.description:
2020-now - Co-founder and CEO of Authologic - the stripe for online identity verification.
2013-2020 - Co-founder and CEO of ZenCard - Polish deep fin-tech startup that was sold in 2017 to the biggest Polish bank.
2006-2013 - COO, Board Member, of the Toyota Financial Services in Poland. Responsible for IT & Operation including AML.
1995-2006 - IT Specialist, Head of IT Exploitation, Deputy CIO at Societe Generale in Poland. Member of the world wide skill team of Societe Generale.

founders.name: Marek Rogoziński, Founder
founders.description:
Co-founder and CTO of Authologic - Stripe for online identity verification.
Previously co-founder of ZenCard, whitch lets you use your regular payment card as  loyalty program identifier.

[Integrations](https://authologic.com/</integrations>)[API Docs](https://authologic.com/<https:/developer.authologic.com/docs/developer-documentation>)[Sandbox](https://authologic.com/<http:/sandbox.authologic.com/>)[About us](https://authologic.com/</about>)

European Banking Authority on e-ID for remote customer onboarding
# Supercharge your existing KYC with e-IDs.
Add government-issued digital IDs, identity wallets and Bank IDs to your existing KYC/AML & KYB infrastructure. No manual checks. No deep-fakes or forged documents. Customise your onboarding without the need of IT, using our modular workflow architecture.
[Try it for Free](https://authologic.com/<#demo-section>)Book a Demo Call
Goodbye, plastic. hello smartphone.
## Photo of a plastic ID in the age of AI?Governments say no!
Governments are issuing digital versions of their plastic and paper documents in the form of digital identity wallets. Digital identity can also be stored in private wallet applications like Apple Wallet or Google Wallet. This makes online identity verification effortless, secure and blazing fast.
Identity wallet
Wallets are easy to use. No more blurry photos of a plastic ID! Whole ID verification process is fully automatic.
They are hard to hack and counterfeit. 
You can also request only the data you need.
![apple wallet](https://authologic.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fapple-wallet.5a6970ca.webp&w=640&q=75)
![google wallet](https://authologic.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fgoogle-wallet.a15097f5.webp&w=640&q=75)
![Identity wallet](https://authologic.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Feducation-step-1.ca74c293.webp&w=3840&q=75)
Identity walletBank IDNFC enabled IDOther
e-id hub is the easy way to connect all the e-ids
## So many e-IDs to integrate, so little time.
Mandatory issuance & acceptance of e-IDs in the EU is underway. This means that every country will have at least one new EU Digital Identity wallet. With private wallets, legacy e-IDs and global adoption surging you need a plan to handle this chaos!
[See our global coverage](https://authologic.com/</integrations>)Book a Demo Call
AML/KYC & KYB Orchestration
## Orchestrate document OCR & liveness checks with the new e-IDs
Not everyone has a digital ID and you need to verify 100% of your users. We got you covered! Our modular workflows can blend right into your existing KYC/KYB infrastructure. Or we can deliver e-IDs orchestrated with document OCR/liveness. Your choice!
##### Anonymous user or bot
##### Bot & Fraud detection
Behavioural analysis
##### Contacts & Customer IDs
SMSE-mailCrypto addressPasskey
##### AML Compliant ID Verification
ID Document OCRGov issued digital IDIdentity WalletBank ID

Liveness Check & face matching

Developers for Developers
## Insanely easy integration
As developers we wanted to make sure you canintegrate with us as quickly as possible.Here is what you need to do:
OmniLinkSDK & WebSDKAPI
### Verify IDs & e-IDs without integration!
No need to integrate, if you have low verification volumes, or no IT resources available. Thanks to our universal admin panel, you can create a verification link called OmniLink and send it to anyone. Results will be visible in the panel.
![Verify IDs & e-IDs
without integration!](https://authologic.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fomni-link-screenshot.10b9fae9.webp&w=3840&q=75)
SUPERCHARGED
## Our success stories
Sports betting onboarding made fully automatic
[Download the full case study](https://authologic.com/<https:/cloudfiles.to/duYH8LATf6f>)
![Cover](https://authologic.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fmech-hourse-cover.a5753441.webp&w=3840&q=75)
Trusted by companies you love:
Say hello to us. Goodbye to broken Kyc.
## Let’s chat!
We will help you to start your journey withthe most advanced e-IDs on the market.
Enter your email and pick a time slot:
Submit
What to expect:
Remember that you give up things when you use e-IDs in your KYC/KYB process.Things like blurry photos, manual work, low conversion rates, fake IDs and countless fraudsters.
Interactive
You’ll see a live demoof our system
Transparent
We will tell you whatare our business terms
Personalized
You’ll get access to your livedemo after the meting

generated_description:
**Authologic: Pioneering Online Identity Verification**

Authologic, founded in 2020 and part of Y Combinator’s W21 batch, is on a mission to bring the ease of Stripe to online identity verification. Think of them as the orchestration layer for Know Your Customer (KYC) and Anti-Money Laundering (AML) processes. They provide businesses with the tools to verify identities through a versatile API that incorporates video/bio-metric verification, banking data, and government-issued digital IDs, all tailored to the specific risk profile of their clients.

Their approach is crucial in today's landscape where authenticity is paramount. With a team of 25, the company operates out of multiple locations, including San Francisco and Warsaw. By integrating government-issued digital identities and identity wallets into existing KYC processes, Authologic aims to eliminate manual checks, thus boosting efficiency and security.

The process is straightforward: businesses can customize their onboarding procedures without needing extensive IT support, utilizing Authologic’s modular architecture. For developers, integrating Authologic's services is fast and user-friendly. In fact, they offer a universal admin panel that allows businesses to verify IDs without any integration, catering to those with lower volumes or limited IT resources.

As e-ID adoption rises, especially within the EU, Authologic is positioned to help companies navigate this evolving landscape. Their API supports a full spectrum of verification scenarios, ensuring that both digital IDs and traditional document checks are seamlessly managed.

In 2023, Authologic emphasizes its commitment to security with certifications like ISO 27001 and ISO 9001, ensuring compliance with regulations like GDPR. With a focus on driving adoption of digital identity solutions, they offer live demos and prioritize transparency in their business interactions.

In short, Authologic is transforming KYC processes for the digital age, allowing businesses to say goodbye to outdated verification methods and embrace a streamlined, automated future. Interested parties can learn more or request a demo on their [website](https://authologic.com).
